feed.title: Category: Double Dragon 2 | MECHAkunEX Media Diary

entry.title: Game: Double Dragon 2 (NES, 1989)
entry.content:
I played through the practice mode of Double Dragon II.

I feel exactly the same about this game as I do about its predecessor. It lacks something special to make the mechanics really active (like River City Ransom) and moves too slow for my taste.
